title: Technical updates to the Job's (RTX) Partner tab.
Improved error message when the Integration Agent connecting to Execute is the wrong version.
The configuration migration tool now copies inactive custom tabs (which are often used for sub-views).
Resolved issue where Export to QByte would fail when using the Integration Agent.
Added a "Drop Table" flag to the Integration Agent Table Replicator configuration. This allows the Integration Agent to automatically drop and recreate the target table when changes happen.
Added support for expression-based event filtering when using Enteprise Events for non-AFE document types.
Resolved issue where configuration migration would fail to match accounts on Overhead Rules.
Improved output message when using the "Test" button on a Workflow Task's Hide Rule.
Resolved issue preventing the legacy reporting tool from connecting to Execute.
Resolved issue where choosing a contributor on a Job's Team-tab would fail if the User Identifying Columns were modified from the default.
